task.instruction: You are Linda Hussein (linda.hussein@company.com) and would like to update the format of template 'Documentation Template 1' to markdown. You would also like to create a new page with its parent as page 1 and it should bear the same space id, title and format as page 2 but the content should be as per the parent of page 29. Page 595 'example' label should be deleted as i am not so sure if it still exist or not.

output.name: Documentation Template 1
output.description: A comprehensive template for technical documentation including sections for overview, requirements, implementation details, and troubleshooting guides.
output.content:
# Documentation Template

## Overview
Provide a clear overview of the system, feature, or process being documented.

## Requirements
- List all prerequisites
- Include system requirements
- Note any dependencies

## Implementation
Detailed step-by-step instructions for implementation.

## Configuration
Configuration parameters and their descriptions.

## Troubleshooting
Common issues and their solutions.

## References
Links to related documentation and resources.

output.title: Process Guidelines - Part 23
output.content:
= Process Guidelines - Part 23 =

Standard operating procedures and process documentation.

== Process Overview ==

This section outlines the process overview requirements and procedures. Ensure compliance with all process overview standards.

== Step-by-Step Guide ==

This section outlines the step-by-step guide requirements and procedures. Ensure compliance with all step-by-step guide standards.

== Requirements ==

This section outlines the requirements requirements and procedures. Ensure compliance with all requirements standards.

== Quality Assurance ==

This section outlines the quality assurance requirements and procedures. Ensure compliance with all quality assurance standards.

== Compliance ==

This section outlines the compliance requirements and procedures. Ensure compliance with all compliance standards.

== See Also ==

* Related pages
* External resources
* Contact information
output.excerpt: Standard operating procedures and process documentation.

output.title: Project Overview
output.content:
# Project Overview

Technical documentation for system architecture and development.

## Architecture

This section covers architecture related information and guidelines. Follow the procedures outlined here to ensure proper architecture implementation.

## API Reference

This section covers api reference related information and guidelines. Follow the procedures outlined here to ensure proper api reference implementation.

## Development Guidelines

This section covers development guidelines related information and guidelines. Follow the procedures outlined here to ensure proper development guidelines implementation.

## Deployment

This section covers deployment related information and guidelines. Follow the procedures outlined here to ensure proper deployment implementation.

## Troubleshooting

This section covers troubleshooting related information and guidelines. Follow the procedures outlined here to ensure proper troubleshooting implementation.

## Additional Resources

- Related documentation links
- Support contact information
- Training materials
output.excerpt: Technical documentation for system architecture and development.
